dmca.title: ArticleInsider alleges another 10 infringements
dmca.body:
Content Infringement Notice
Attn: DMCA complaints
On behalf of
Articlelnsider.com
6/28/2005
Contact Info:
Infosearch Media, Inc. 
[private]
Marina Del Rey, CA 90292
Phone: [private] 
Fax: [private]
Attn: [private] at [private]@infosearchmedia.com
Incident#1
The copyrighted work at issue is the article "Guarantee a Great Vacation with an Idaho Fishing Guide" by Rylee Newton posted on the Article Insider web site at http://adventuretravel.articleinsider.com/68264_idaho_fishing_guide.html
Search Query: "A good Idaho fishing guide can give you tips for reeling in the big fish."
Infringing Web Pages: http://www.fishing-place.com/fishing-lake-trout/stealheadfishingtips.htm
My email: [private]@infosearchmedia.com Address: Infosearch Media, Inc. [private] Marina Del Rey, CA 90292 Phone: [private]
Email of infringing website: N/A
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
Signature
Fax to: [private]

Incident#2
The copyrighted work at issue is the article "The Use of Tasers" by Jeremy Horelick posted on the Article Insider web site at http://homesecurity.articleinsider.com/198011_stun_guns_and_security.html
Search Query: "One reason stun guns are such effective security devices is their target specificity." Infringing Web Pages: http://www.makeup.wefixitnow.com/wordpress/
My email: [private]@infosearchmedia.com Address: Infosearch Media, Inc. [private] Marina Del Rey, CA 90292 Phone: [private]
Email of infringing website: N/A
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
Signature
Fax to: [private]

Incident#3
The copyrighted work at issue is the article "There's No Place Like Hawaii" by Tom Powell posted on the Article Insider web site at http://mexicotravel.articleinsider.com/23841_hawaii_travel.html,
Search Query: "Hawaii offers the beauty and tropical atmosphere of resort destinations worldwide, without leaving the comfort of our country_" Infringing Web Pages: http://www.hawaii-beach-vacation
